0000101100110101 0111010000111101 0 -> sum: 0111111101110010, cout: 0
1111101111010011 0000110010010011 0 -> sum: 0000100001100110, cout: 1
1011010111110101 0010100101011000 1 -> sum: 1101111101001110, cout: 0
0011101010001110 0111100010001000 1 -> sum: 1011001100010111, cout: 0
0011111100110000 1100011100011101 0 -> sum: 0000011001001101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
